revised_title: Phylogenetic Analysis of the Gastropod Genus Littorina Using DNA Sequences
tldr: The authors reconstructed the phylogeny of the gastropod genus Littorina using DNA sequences from three mitochondrial genes. They found Littorina to be a monophyletic group and tested two biogeographic hypotheses. The study provides insights into the macroevolutionary history of Littorina species and their relationships with other genera.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Evolutionary Biology
